en_us: Craft 'em up, throw 'em down, blow 'em up! But be careful not to blow yourself up!
Landmines can be crafted in a Custom Crafter with tnt and some redstone.\n\nWhen stepping on a landmine or breaking the block it's planted in, it will explode.
The recipe for a Landmine is as follows:
Landmines can be armed by dropping them on the ground.\n\nThey can be disabled by dropping shears or a Soft Defuser, which will cause the landmine to spray instant damage instead of exploding.
A soft defuser can be crafted like so:
Landmines can also be crafted with disguised materials.
Landmines can be disguised as crafting tables, dirt, grass blocks, netherrack, stone bricks, and stone.\n\nIf diamonds are used as the disguiser, it will be invisible and only display particles.
